chapters.title: Chapter 1: Time to Be Gone
chapters.info: Selucia, p. 108 (117)—One of Tuon's servants; the one who shaves her head every morning. She has golden hair, piercing blue eyes, skin the color of buttery cream, and an “impressive” bosom. She is effectively a prisoner of Mat, along with her mistress. See also Paendrag, Tuon Athaem Kore.
